title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT; supports multi-user, RAG, plugins, and voice.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility; offers synchronous, async, and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template showing how to build a RAG pipeline over Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; offers chat history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in open-source replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama; offers /v1/completions endpoint.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies OpenAI-style requests to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with Blazor sample; supports chat, completion, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that exposes Ollama as @Beans for chat, embedding, and tool-calling services.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-chat
summary: YouTube walkthrough repo demonstrating a full RAG chatbot using Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma with Gradio UI.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation that builds Ollama from source or installs the binary with GPU acceleration flags.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks pairing Ollama with Open-WebUI, Nextcloud, and more.
